page.title: 13TRADE-MARKET
page.content: Whitchurch has enough{shops}but people go to Chester or Shrewsbury to get clothes,family presents and other things.Some of the smaller shops don't take advantage of being small,they don't make them interesting and tidy. Every shop in Chester and Shrewsbury is interesting to attract more customers. At{the market}there are 30 stalls most have been there over 10 years half are food stalls.Most of the buyers do not come from Whitchurch and come to the market regularly.All the stall owners had stalls on other markets 2 had shops as well.Some stall owners came a long way to the market. No stall owners had other jobs and most owned stalls on other markets. {Tesco supermarket}was built in 1982.It used to be a car park.People use Tesco regularly.It is easier to shop at Tesco than going to the little shops.
